romaji: To you, yes, my love to you
english: To you, yes, my love to you

romaji: Yes, my love to you, you, to you
english: Yes, my love to you, you, to you

romaji: watashi wa watashi anata wa anata to
english: I am me, and you are you —

romaji: yūbe itteta sonna ki mo suru wa
english: Last night, you said that… it felt that way.
That gray jacket,

romaji: mioboe ga aru kōhī no shimi
english: I recognize it — even the coffee stain.
You’re still the same, aren’t you?
When our reflection meets in the shop window—
Stay with me
You knocked on my midnight door,
I cried, begging you not to leave.

romaji: ano kisetsu ga ima me no mae
english: That season is now right before my eyes.
Stay with me
Saying the phrases we used to say,
I held onto our shared moments,
Still treasuring them, not forgetting.

romaji: koi to ai to wa chigau mono da yo to
english: “Love and romance are different things,” you said—

romaji: yūbe iwareta sonna ki mo suru wa
english: Last night… or at least it felt that way.
The second winter came,
And your heart drifted away.
Whenever I looked back,

romaji: soko ni anata o kanjite ita no
english: I always felt you were still there.
Stay with me
You knocked on my midnight door,
And left a hole in my heart.

romaji: ano kisetsu ga ima me no mae
english: That season is now right before my eyes.
Stay with me
To ease the loneliness,
I dropped the needle on a record,
Letting the same melody repeat again and again.
Stay with me
You knocked on my midnight door,
I cried, begging you not to leave.

romaji: ano kisetsu ga ima me no mae
english: That season is now right before my eyes.
Stay with me
Saying the phrases we used to say,
I held onto our shared moments,
Still keeping them warm, not forgetting.
